page.syntax: Result_String as C = OEM_TO_ANSI(C string,N length)

argument.name: string
argument.description: A string containing characters to be translated.

argument.name: length
argument.description: The number of characters to translate. Numeric

page.discussion: OEM_TO_ANSI() converts the specified Number_of_Characters in the Source_Buffer from the OEM (DOS) character set to the ANSI (Windows) character set, and returns the result in Result_String.
